languages.text: "Ты прав, Наместник. Смерти людей в карантинной зоне — необходимая плата за безопасность станции".
"You're right, Liege. The deaths of the people in the quarantine zone is a necessary price to pay for the station's security."
languages.original_text: "Ты прав, Наместник. Смерти людей в карантинной зоне — необходимая плата за безопасность станции".

traits.locale_text: "You're right, Liege. The deaths of the people in the quarantine zone is a necessary price to pay for the station's safety."
"You're right, Liege. The deaths of the people in the quarantine zone is a necessary price to pay for the station's safety."
"You're right, Liege. The deaths of the people in the quarantine zone is a necessary price to pay for the station's security."
"You're right, Liege. The deaths of the people in the quarantine zone is a necessary price to pay for the station's security."
"You're right, Liege. The deaths of the people in the quarantine zone is a necessary price to pay for the station's security."

languages.text: 「その通りだ、領主よ。隔離区域にいた人間の死は、ステーションの安全確保に必要な犠牲だ」
languages.original_text: "You're right, Liege. The deaths of the people in the quarantine zone is a necessary price to pay for the station's security."

traits.locale_text: 「その通りだ、領主よ。隔離区域にいた人間の死は、ステーションの安全確保に必要な犠牲だ」

languages.text: “你说得没错。为了这座星站的安全，只能牺牲掉隔离区的人员，这是必要的代价。”
languages.original_text: "You're right, Liege. The deaths of the people in the quarantine zone is a necessary price to pay for the station's security."

traits.locale_text: “你说得没错。为了这座星站的安全，只能牺牲掉隔离区的人员，这是必要的代价。”

languages.text: «Tiene razón, Señor. Las muertes de la zona de cuarentena son un mal necesario para la seguridad de la estación».
languages.original_text: "You're right, Liege. The deaths of the people in the quarantine zone is a necessary price to pay for the station's security."

traits.locale_text: «Tiene razón, Señor. Las muertes de la zona de cuarentena son un mal necesario para la seguridad de la estación».

languages.text: « Vous avez raison, suzerain. La mort des personnes enfermées dans la zone de quarantaine est un mal nécessaire qui permettra d'assurer la sécurité de la station. »
languages.original_text: "You're right, Liege. The deaths of the people in the quarantine zone is a necessary price to pay for the station's security."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez raison, suzerain. La mort des personnes enfermées dans la zone de quarantaine est un mal nécessaire qui permettra d'assurer la sécurité de la station. »

languages.text: "Ihr habt recht, Lehnsherr. Der Tod der Menschen in der Quarantänezone ist ein notwendiges Opfer für die Sicherheit der Station."
languages.original_text: "You're right, Liege. The deaths of the people in the quarantine zone is a necessary price to pay for the station's security."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt recht, Lehnsherr. Der Tod der Menschen in der Quarantänezone ist ein notwendiges Opfer für die Sicherheit der Station."

languages.text: "Haklısın Emîr. Karantina bölgesindeki insanların ölümü, istasyonun güvenliği için ödenmesi gereken bir bedel."
languages.original_text: "You're right, Liege. The deaths of the people in the quarantine zone is a necessary price to pay for the station's security."

traits.locale_text: "Haklısın Emîr. Karantina bölgesindeki insanların ölümü, istasyonun güvenliği için ödenmesi gereken bir bedel."
